name: Gold Rush (Armed Gorilla)
description:
This game was developed during half of a week for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "Not Real".

I've solo created the game with more or less all of its assets except the audio and some of the animations.

Objective

You've come to an isolated island in hopes of finding gold. Pick one of the digging spots (marked with a question mark) and start digging. You have about 30% chance of finding some sweet gold. Carry the gold back to your boat.

Be quick though, you have limited time before you have to head back..

Controls
  • Move around with Arrow-keys or WASD-keys
  • Attack with Space-key or Left Mouse Button
  • Interact with E-key or Right Mouse Button

Sadly I ran out of time, so there is really nothing to attack.. but it's still fun swinging that shovel around 😁

I hope you enjoy the game.
